main event: Two bright light balls were observed side by side oscillating and flashing rapidly in Monticello, Illinois on November 8, 1960.
interesting points: The objects hovered for about 3 to 5 seconds before speeding off quickly., The objects emitted no sound during the sighting., The observation was reported by an official U.S. Air Force investigation team., The objects had no visible trail or exhaust., The sighting duration was estimated to be very brief, lasting only a few seconds.
